name: Ninjask
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

poke_power.name: Cast-off Shell
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Ninjask from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon and if your Bench isn’t full, you may put Shedinja onto your Bench as a Basic Pokémon from your hand or your discard pile.

attacks.name: Chip Off
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.
